# Architecture Decision Records

This directory contains Architecture Decision Records (ADRs) documenting significant technical decisions.

## Index

| ADR | Title | Status |
|-----|-------|--------|
| [001](adr_001%20-%20Adoption%20of%20Geocentric%20Tropical%20Ecliptic%20Coordinates.md) | Geocentric Tropical Ecliptic Coordinates | Accepted |
| [002](adr_002_semantic_versioning.md) | Semantic Versioning | Accepted |
| [003](adr_003_cicd_pipeline.md) | CI/CD Pipeline | Accepted |
| [004](adr_004_agent_native_governance.md) | Agent-Native Governance | Accepted |

## ADR Template

```markdown
# ADR NNN: Title

## Status
Proposed | Accepted | Deprecated | Superseded

## Context
Why this decision is needed.

## Decision
What was decided.

## Consequences
Positive and negative implications.
```
